page.title: 13Friday at Redhill Middle
page.content: At 8.55 we start school, we have registration followed by activities. This includes painting, sketching pictures, making models out of clay and paper, some people work with material. Assembly is at 9.45 we have pieces of music and pupils showing pictures and reading written work. The Headmaster tells stories of past and present and we sing songs which we have learned. At 10.30 till 11.45 we have four maths groups and we work on primary maths books. When the bell goes it is dinner time and we play until our number is held up, then we have our dinner. The bell goes at 1.00p.m. and we have French until 2.00p.m. followed by a half an hour reading session. Afternoon break is until 2.45p.m. then we have games groups for outdoor games until 3.30 Hometime.
